markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Blazing Dive](/Spells.aspx?ID=869)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Mahja Firehair](/Deities.aspx?ID=557), [Vonymos](/Deities.aspx?ID=553), [Xiquiripat](/Deities.aspx?ID=603), [Zursvaater](/Deities.aspx?ID=501)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

Superheated air collects under you, buoying you high into the sky before you plummet back down in a fiery comet. You [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) 15 feet straight up into the air, then Fly in a straight line to an empty space of your choice on the ground within 60 feet. When you land, the blistering air blasts out from you, dealing 3d4 bludgeoning damage and 3d6 fire damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save) to all creatures in a 10-foot emanation.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d4 bludgeoning and 1d6 fire.
name: Blazing Dive

[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Fly up, then dive in an explosion of superheated air.
</summary>
summary: Fly up, then dive in an explosion of superheated air.
summary_markdown: Fly up, then dive in an explosion of superheated air.
text: Blazing Dive Two Actions Source Secrets of Magic pg. 91 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Mahja Firehair, Vonymos, Xiquiripat, Zursvaater Cast somatic, verbal Saving Throw basic Reflex --- Superheated air collects under you, buoying you high into the sky before you plummet back down in a fiery comet. You Fly 15 feet straight up into the air, then Fly in a straight line to an empty space of your choice on the ground within 60 feet. When you land, the blistering air blasts out from you, dealing 3d4 bludgeoning damage and 3d6 fire damage (basic Reflex save) to all creatures in a 10-foot emanation. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4 bludgeoning and 1d6 fire.
